title: There is no point in playing more than one MOBA game.
body:
I can play different types of games in any other genre, but games like DOTA and League of Legends I can't. I'm content with only playing League and I don't really care to try any other MOBAs. They are pretty much all the same.

Anyone else feel this way? I "tried" Dota 2 a couple of times and said to myself "Might as well be playing LoL. Faster to get into a game anyway on LoL".

Thoughts?
